text: Hagi Ra Anumzamo'a huno, Tamagra huta ama kumamo'a havizantfa higeno, magore huno vahemo'ene zagagafamo'enena omani'ne huta nehuta, Judama me'nea kuma tamimpine Jerusalemi kumapima me'nea ne'onse kantamimpina, magore huno vahe'ene zagagafanena omanitfa hu'ne huta nehaze. Hianagi henka ana kuma tamimpina vahera ete esageta zamagerura antahigahaze.
